ddm.agents

Class ClassifierAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.Agent
      • ddm.agents.ClassifierAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jade.core.TimerListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClassifierAgent
extends jade.core.Agent
    Author:
    jordi Corbilla ClassifierAgent class. This class generates the agent wrapper that deals with the requests from the manager and classifies the data according to the configuration section.
    See Also:
